overview: In the future, there will only beâ€¦the lazy rich and the lazy poor. But that doesn't mean they're not hung, sexy and horny! Director Thor Stephans (Playing With Fire 2) lines up an all-star cast for his deadly sin, SLOTH. But Thor isn't a slouch when it comes to getting his men to deliver it for the camera.
title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Sloth
